markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Limited">[Aiudara Seeker](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=127)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Legacy - Age of Ashes" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=270" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 73</row>

</column>

The _aiudara_ of Alseta’s Ring have become more well known, and you are interested in learning more about them.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) skill, and the [Portal Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Quick Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=824) skill feat.
name: Aiudara Seeker

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Arcana skill, and the Portal Lore skill.
